actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Parks, Preservation and Recreation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Parks, Historic Preservation, and Recreation

official_title: A bill to establish America's Agricultural Heritage Partnership in Iowa, and for other purposes.
short_title: America's Agricultural Heritage Partnership Act of 1996

summary.text: America's Agricultural Heritage Partnership Act of 1996 - Establishes in Iowa the America's Agricultural Heritage Partnership to promote the story of American agriculture, centered upon the area of Waterloo and northeast Iowa. Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to provide grants and technical assistance to the Partnership, and to enter into related cooperative agreements with private and governmental entities. Establishes a Partnership management entity and requires the development of a management plan. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: America's Agricultural Heritage Partnership Act of 1996
A bill to establish America's Agricultural Heritage Partnership in Iowa, and for other purposes.
